articles.title: 15,700 Deaths In Europe In 2022 Linked To Heatwaves: UN's Climate Change Report - NDTV
articles.description: Record levels of heat-trapping greenhouse gases have led to increased incidences of droughts, floods and heatwaves on a global scale, the World Meteorological Organisation's (WMO) annual report for 2022 said.
articles.content:
Climate Change Report: Global mean temperatures for the past eight years have been the highest on record
